ðŸ“– Summary: Kdenlive is a free and open-source video editor that provides professional-grade video editing capabilities. It is built on the MLT Framework and KDE Frameworks, utilizing technologies like frei0r and LADSPA for video and audio effects. The primary use case is for creating and editing videos, ranging from simple home videos to complex projects.
